oracle.cdc.my_table.15m.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, VALUE, UPDATED_AT FROM CDC_TEST.MY_TABLE WHERE UPDATED_AT > TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND UPDATED_AT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') ORDER BY UPDATED_AT

oracle.cdc.my_table.30m.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, VALUE, UPDATED_AT FROM CDC_TEST.MY_TABLE WHERE UPDATED_AT > TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND UPDATED_AT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') ORDER BY UPDATED_AT

oracle.cdc.my_table.60m.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, VALUE, UPDATED_AT FROM CDC_TEST.MY_TABLE WHERE UPDATED_AT > TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND UPDATED_AT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') ORDER BY UPDATED_AT

oracle.cdc.orders.15m.sql: SELECT ORDER_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY, TOTAL_AMOUNT, STATUS, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT FROM CDC_TEST.ORDERS WHERE MODIFIED_AT > TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND MODIFIED_AT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(${range_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') ORDER BY MODIFIED_AT
